THANKS TO HAROLD ENGEL
Our thanks to Harold for his appeal to NAEB members for support. The newly-
appointed executive secretary will welcome all sorts of contributions, suggestions,
and criticisms. Come one, come all* Letâ€™s have a special report from every member
for the next HEWS LETTER, which will come from the presses soon - sooner in elapsed
time than this issue.
UNTIL THEN. REMEMBER:
1. The National Conference on Educational Broadcasting.
2. Your material for the exhibit at the Conference*
3. The Educational Broadcasting System.
4. Dope for the editor.
